alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 17 at 6:46AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL WALTON AND SOUTHWESTERN HOLMES COUNTIES THROUGH 630 AM CDT... At 546 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Florala to 8 miles west of De Funiak Springs to near Eglin Air Force Base. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... De Funiak Springs, Eglin Air Force Base, Union, Liberty, Freeport, Pond Creek, Oakwood Hills, Cluster Springs, Fox Hill, Douglass Crossroad, Sand Hill, Alpine Heights, De Funiak Spring Airport, Rock Hill, Eucheeanna, Pleasant Hill, Pleasant Ridge, Center Ridge, New Home, and Knox Hill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Holmes; North Walton; South Walton
